Question.Subject: Is anyone else having trouble with Deviantart.com ?
Question.Content: For most pages it takes so long and does not show picture. Does anyone know why ?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
The server's down apparently. Seems I'm not the only one who can't access it either. It's just showing a blank screen.
It's on dA's end. Wouldn't be too surprised if they crashed their own site tacking on more annoying "updated features". :b
Just gotta wait it out, I guess.

Yeh, same here. I dunno why; I guess it's just maintenance or something? They typically get these things fixed soon enough though. lol
